descriptions.description: The chronogram inferred from "Cyathea_alignment.nexus", using BEAST. Three secondary calibration priors (see table 3 of the paper), a birth-death speciation prior, and the relaxed clock Log normal model were used. Three independent MCMC runs with 10,000,000 generation were carried out. The trees from the three runs were combined in LogCombiner with a 10% burn-in and summarized in TreeAnnotator.
